story.description: It is October 31st and you are trick or treating
You came upon the last street of the night and saw only one house
Wanting candy, you walked up to the house and knocked only to hear an eerie hollow sound almost as if the house was abandoned
All of a sudden, the door creaked open and the candy bowl was sitting inside
Not wanting to miss the last candy of the night you walked inside
Instantly the door slammed shut behind you, you turned around but the door was already locked
A bizarre voice echoed throughout the house saying, ‘You will not escape’
Suddenly a door to the left scraped open and the voice said, ‘If you want to leave you must solve the puzzles in the rooms to unlock the keys’

achievements.title: Speedrun: Complete the room in 5 minutes or less
Hintless: Complete a room without using a single hint
Flawless: Complete a room without getting a puzzle wrong
Perfect: Achieve a perfect score on a room
Master: Complete all rooms on the highest difficulty

items.name: Room key 4
items.description: The final key, proceed with caution

puzzles.description: Five people were eating apples, A finished before B, but behind C. D finished before E, but behind B. What was the finishing order?
puzzles.name: Order of Completion

givenItem.name: Room key 1
givenItem.description: A key, should allow entry into a locked place

puzzles.description: I have keys but no locks. I have space, but no room. You can enter but can't go outside. What am I?
puzzles.name: Half of Expectations

item.name: Room key 1
item.description: A key, should allow entry into a locked place

puzzles.description: What does “pmllhv xka pzxov” mean? Shift backward by 3
hints: Shift each letter backwards 3 - L is I

puzzles.description: What can run but cannot walk?
puzzles.name: Running?

puzzles.description: Use a ceasar cypher +5 to decrypt “ynrj nx wzssnsl tzy”
puzzles.name: Caesar's Message
hints: Move each letter forward by 5 in the alphabet
